item.title: eMTS 080125: What is Typo Traffic and Where Does It Come From?
item.description: Jaclyn Easton talks about this simple to understand yet often overlooked subject of typos and misspellings.
item.author: pros@emarketingtalkshow.com (Cindy Turrietta)
item.itunes:author: eMarketingTalkShow, eMarketing Talk Show, Cindy Turrietta
item.itunes:keywords: domain names, domains, typos, misspellings, typo, typo strategy, typos strategy, jaclyn easton, cindy turrietta, typo gold, missing dot, wwww domain, ww domain

item.title: eMTS 080125: Domain Typo Strategy
item.description: Not the same as Typo SEO, domain typo strategy can be utilized in a number of ways. Jaclyn shares some with us in this segment.
item.author: pros@emarketingtalkshow.com (Cindy Turrietta)

item.title: eMTS 080125: Why Develop a Typo Strategy
item.description: Not for every website, a domain typo strategy can help companies recoup thousands of dollars. Find out what is happening with domains and who needs to be concerned about typos and who does not.
item.author: pros@emarketingtalkshow.com (Cindy Turrietta)

item.title: eMTS 080125: Typo Strategy Tips
item.description: Wouldn' t you like to know a couple of things you could do right away? In this segment Jaclyn shares some of her domain strategy secrets with us.

item.title: eMTS 080125: Secrets of a Typo Traffic Strategist
item.description: Jaclyn Easton, the world' s only Typo Traffic Strategist, proves to you that most websites (including yours) lose hundreds, even thousands of visitors a day to this curable condition and offers some quick, easy solutions that can be implemented immediately.
item.author: pros@emarketingtalkshow.com (Cindy Turrietta)
